events.message: Hello, I recently ordered a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I want to know how I can get a refund for this item.
The issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to customer requesting money back for a product that does not fit.
Assigning this case to agent Sarah from the refund team to assist with the customer's refund process.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer care. I see you'd like a refund for your jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you also confirm if the jacket is unused and still has its tags? This will help us process the refund faster.
Sure, the order number is #452789 and yes, the jacket is completely unused with all original tags intact.
Thanks for the info. We will initiate the refund process immediately once you send the jacket back via the prepaid label we will email you shortly.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate you sending the prepaid label, that makes returning the jacket easier.
The refund case is now resolved with the prepaid return label sent to your email. Please send the jacket back within 14 days.
Just checking in to see if you have returned the jacket and if everything is going smoothly with the refund process.
Yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the prepaid label and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The case has been closed successfully as the refund has been processed and sent to your original payment method.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund process and customer service experience.
